text: tilk alquraa alati taqaddam dhikruha, wahi quraa qawm nuh whwd wasalih wlwt wsheyb, nqss ealayk -ayha alrswl- min akhbarha, wama kan min 'amr rusul allah alty 'ursilat 'ilyhm, ma yahsul bih eibratan llmetbryn wazdjar llzalmyn. walaqad ja'at ahl alquraa rusulana balhjj albayinat ealaa sdqhm, fama kanuu liuminuu bima ja'athum bih alrsl; bsbb tughyanihim wtkdhybhm balhq, wamathal khatm allah ealaa qulub hwla' alkafirin almdhkwryn yakhtim allah ealaa qulub alkafirin bmhmd salaa allah ealayh wslm
